Summary: I like the coffee, but the k-cups are problematic
text: I ordered three different flavors, and I although the coffee is great and not bitter, the k-cups are problematic.  A lot of other people have voiced the same problem and my description is the same.  Foil comes loose, coffee cup only halfway full, and lots of grounds in my cup.  If I could rate them separately, I would give the coffee 4 stars and the cups 1 star.  I have considered busting them open and putting the coffee in my re-useable cup.
